error.no_flipr_id_found: No flipr or hub associated to your account for now. You should verify it is working with the Flipr's mobile app first.

duplicate_config.title: Duplicate conflicting flipr configurations
duplicate_config.description: You have many fliprs configured with the same account. In the new version of flipr integration, the configuration has changed internaly. Please remove the fliprs you have and then reconfigure the integration. You will not loose any data nor automation since the flipr entities will be recreated with the same names.
